Method Detail

agglomerativeCluster

public static int[] agglomerativeCluster(Matrix m,
                                         int numClusters)
Clusters the rows of the matrix into the specified number of clusters using a hierarchical agglomerative clustering algorithm. Rows that have no distinguishing features will not be clustered and instead assigned to a cluster index of -1.

Parameters:
m - a matrix whose rows are to be clustered
numClusters - the number of clusters into which the matrix should divided
Returns:
an array where each element corresponds to a row and the value is the cluster number to which that row was assigned. Cluster numbers will start at 0 and increase. Rows that were not able to be clustered will be assigned a -1 value.
Throws:
IOError - if any IOException occurs when marshalling data to and from Cluto, or during Cluto's execution.
